meaning: Unique style / In a class of its own
description: Having a unique and distinct style.

examples.chinese: 名人书画非凡气场,自成一格
examples.translation: Famous paintings have extraordinary aura, unique style

examples.chinese: 她的穿搭自成一格真的好piu亮
examples.translation: Her outfit has a unique style, really beautiful

examples.chinese: 别墅网房屋设计图,自成一格的居家空间
examples.translation: Villa design blueprint, unique living space
